explanation: [0-0] In the upper half of the screen, a young man with silver hair and blue eyes is sitting in a simulated mine cart. Behind him and on the ground is a green screen, with blue on both sides. He is wearing a blue T-shirt, gripping the wooden boards of the mine cart with both hands, his mouth tightly shut. In front of him is a mobile phone, the screen displaying the scene of him sitting in the mine cart. In the lower half of the screen, the young man is placed in a game scene with lava and honeycomb blocks. He maintains his previous posture and expression, looking straight ahead.

[0-5] As the man shakes the board in his hand, a giant ghast gradually approaches in the lower half of the screen. The young man's expression changes accordingly, from an initial smile to increasing fear. He immediately speeds up the shaking of the board in his hand. The man's expression and movements in the upper half of the screen are synchronized with those in the lower half.

[5-8] Immediately afterward, the ghast breathes fire, and the picture becomes blurred. The lower half of the screen turns into a blurred pink game over interface, displaying the white subtitles "You died!" and "Score: 0". There are also two gray rectangular boxes with two lines of white subtitles: "Respawn" and "Title screen". Several gray and white moon patterns appear in the upper half of the screen. Finally, the picture gradually becomes clear. In the upper half of the screen, only the empty mine cart can be seen against the green screen background. In the lower half, on the game over interface, the ghast floats on the lava.
